name: NijiMecha - Artstyle LORA
description:
Trained on NAI with 138 pictures from nijijourney default and expressive.
Best result with weight between : 0.8-1.

Prompt activator : None
But I recommend to use mecha related prompts like :
mecha, robot, armor, bodysuit, mechanical arms, science fiction, no humans

Commissioned by realitylvn on fiverr

Reviews are really appreciated, i love to see the community use my work, that's why I share it.
If you like my work, you can tip me here.

Got a specific request ? I'm open for commission on my fiverr gig *! If you provide enough data, OCs are accepted

*Any paid request will not be presented on this page, unless you give me permission to.

meta.prompt: masterpiece, best quality, 1girl, bodysuit, full body , long hair, blonde hair, mechanical arms, medium breasts, pink scarf, science fiction, solo, standing,  simple background <lora:nijiMecha:1>
